notes.body: Hello Purba,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database.      We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any request or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number, and confirm if you have requested account deactivation.      After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm the so that we can proceed with the request.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Purba,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. 

We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. 

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any request or reactivate the account.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number, and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. 

After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm the so that we can proceed with the request.

Regards,
Tahera

notes.body: Hello Purba,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,     Neeha
notes.body_html:

I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account. 
 
Awaiting your earliest response.
 
Regards,
Neeha

notes.body: Hello Purba,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account.    I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.   Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.   Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Purba,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account. 

I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.

Regards,
Neeha

notes.body: Hello Purba,     Greetings from team PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your concern raised about account deactivation.     As per update received from our team, our team member has called you  however you were non contactable. Please be informed you that, for account deactivation process our team member will called you on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the deactivation process.       So we request you to kindly reach us back if you wish to deactivate your account.       If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Purba,

Greetings from team PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your concern raised about account deactivation.

As per update received from our team, our team member has called you  however you were non contactable. Please be informed you that, for account deactivation process our team member will called you on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the deactivation process.  

So we request you to kindly reach us back if you wish to deactivate your account.  
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Academic Reaserch Reqest:Veer Narmad South Gujarat University case study on pharmeasy business Strategy and growth
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Pharmeasy,

My name is Panchal Kush and I Am a Bsc.IT 2nd year student at jp dawar institute of information and technology, Veer Narmad South Gujarat University. We are conducting detailed academic casestudies on the Pharmeasy startup.

To ensure the accuracy and depth of our analysis, we would be grateful if you could provide insight into  For example: 

1. What were the key challenges in integrating Medlife and Thyrocare from an operational perspective?

 2. How is the company prioritizing profitability while managing high customer acquisition costs?

     We understand your team is extremely busy. We would appreciate a response to these two questions via email at your earliest convenience. The deadline for our project is [Date]. | Show awareness of their time constraints and provide a reasonable deadline.

                        Thank you!! for your time and consideration. We believe the inclusion of official company perspective will greatly enhance the educational value of our case study. 
  

Thank You.

Your sincerely, 
Panchal Kush.

notes.body: Hello Kavyasri,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #658108902457282560-61181, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 14th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Kavyasri,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658108902457282560-61181, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 14th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Please accept our delay in response.   I completely understand your concern with regards to PharmEasy Portable Nebulizer Machine, please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.   As per the update received from our Operations team, the order has been replaced for you from the Amazon platform (#171-0171421-2349127). For more information, please reach out to Amazon customer service. ​ I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.     For any further assistance, you can also contact the customer service team on 07737 373 026 (10:00 am to 7:00 pm) or reach out to us through our support channels, on the app or Website, listed in the Need Help Section.   Thank you for choosing Pharmeasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, PharmEasy.
notes.body_html:
Hello Bhushan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Please accept our delay in response.
 
I completely understand your concern with regards to PharmEasy Portable Nebulizer Machine, please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you.
 
As per the update received from our Operations team, the order has been replaced for you from the Amazon platform (#171-0171421-2349127). For more information, please reach out to Amazon customer service.
​
I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.
   
For any further assistance, you can also contact the customer service team on 07737 373 026 (10:00 am to 7:00 pm) or reach out to us through our support channels, on the app or Website, listed in the Need Help Section.
 
Thank you for choosing Pharmeasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy.
